summary: Successfully tested Local 3D Generation Fix - all core functionality working perfectly. Dashboard loads correctly, molecule generation (aspirin, caffeine) works, 3D viewer renders beautiful molecular structures with sticks and spheres, and API integration is seamless with no CORS errors.

minor_bugs.issue: Invalid SMILES returns 520 instead of expected 400 status code
minor_bugs.impact: Minor - error handling works but status code inconsistent

minor_warnings.issue: Console warning about undefined jsmeOnLoad function
minor_warnings.impact: No functional impact - just console noise
Normal WebGL behavior - no functional issues

passed_tests: 3D viewer rendering with sticks and spheres
